full_text:
What's the chance of a personality coming through that I have gotten often,
while I'm doing a test video. 'bout a bazillion to one? How many times do
they call me "Purple", just about everytime I turn one of these on.

 Then, what about other methods, what's the chance of the boxes mentioned
while flipping between channels pairs on cable TV? At 10-11 seconds on this
video "Your boxes---you hear us". It's not just "a box" thing, it's anything
that provides bits of speech, and/or sound frequencies. Recording seems to
allow manipulation of the sound bits, as if it's done in the air, between
source and recorder/ear---but you can also get the same thing with no
external sound, recording from a line output on the box/radio. This subject
can be extrememly complicated, with many variables.

 I go by results, screw science, mostly they want what is in the text book,
or you have to be a PH.D to think of something new. Certain subjects are
strictly taboo, like anything spirit/God. We've gone round and round
with the so called skeptics here, they accept no evidence, can't test this
stuff, cuz there maybe a chance of it being real, so they just call us all
names--real scientific! I mean the mind numbing mental gymnastics these
dorks do to try explain why there is no conciousness in the universe is
appalling. Thought experiment by ph.d, that makes it fact!

 There are supposed paranormal researchers and sites that claim the boxes
don't work, they're just veiled skeptics, a skpetic in this case being a
non-believer that can not be convinced no matter what the evidence.

 Most important is that users learn life is forever, there are multiple
levels,  and tell others. That's all it's for. I don't think we are supposed
to get the absolute proof, there's that faith thing--or making one reach
outside themselves.

 Try leaving out the "haunted location", yeah scary but record at home.
Entites are everywhere, and you may get more repeatble results.

 F-S
